job_tasks.phrase: Zelfstandig generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the traditional software engineering task of integrating AI services into an application, fitting the definition of building and deploying software features.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen.
job_tasks.justification: 'Sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen' directly refers to the process of developing, experimenting with, or refining machine learning models, which falls under AI specialization.
Exploring new AI capabilities aligns with the research and experimentation aspect of model development and AI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen.
job_tasks.justification: Developing solutions with clients requires understanding business needs and translating them into technical strategies, fitting the definition of business understanding and strategy.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes a 'Mendix Engineer' who will implement 'generatieve AI services' (Macro-Category A task) and collaborate on 'vernieuwende ML modellen' and explore 'nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI' (Macro-Category B tasks). The role also involves developing solutions with clients (Macro-Category C task). This indicates a balanced mix of core software engineering (A) and AI specialization (B), with a clear focus on generative AI. The 'Mendix Engineer' title suggests a strong software engineering foundation, making 'Core GenAI Engineer' the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is concise but clearly outlines responsibilities that span both software engineering (implementation) and AI/ML model work (development, exploration). The mention of 'generatieve AI' is specific. The classification is straightforward based on the provided categories. A score of 4 reflects high confidence, with a slight deduction for the brevity of the ad which could leave room for minor interpretation.
